title: Clock
description: Transparent non-interactive window app showing current time located in the bottom right corner of a desktop. Wanted to try Tauri and see the clock while having taskbard hidden.

title: WLED Ambilight
description: Yet another Ambilight solution. This time for WLED. Tray app connects to WLED device and sends average border colors of a screen. Colors are calculated on GPU with the aim to get the lowest possible CPU/GPU usage. It is my first bigger project in Rust language. Learnt a bit of DirectX and some Windows API features.

title: E-Ink wireless display
description: Everyday morning I would love to see current shopping list, weather, how long will be commuting and other useful things. Seems like putting a tablet on wall would do the trick but I wanted something more challenging. ðŸ’ª

title: Pipeliner
description: Pipeliner automates boring repetitive tasks with CRON-like scheduler. Motivation: Some web portals do not have RSS feed and I want to be informed when new article comes out.
